textBox.richText: Always look on the bright side of life...

Can’t stop whistling that damn song now. We saw an absolutely fantastic show this evening- Monty Pythons Spamalot. It was such a funny show. If anyone gets a chance to see it go for it. You won’t be disappointed. Pretty much based on Monty Pythons The Holy Grail it also has a few famous skits from Life of Brian and their Flying Circus series.
